# Spring Volunteer Day at Powderhorn Community Garden

**Saturday, April 12, 2026 | 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM**

Powderhorn Community Garden, 3524 15th Ave S, Minneapolis, MN 55407

Join your neighbors for our annual spring kickoff! We'll be preparing raised beds, spreading compost, and planting early-season crops. No gardening experience needed.

## What to Bring
- Gloves (extras available)
- Water bottle
- Sunscreen

## What We Provide
- All tools and seeds
- Coffee and pastries from Cafe Racer
- Lunch from World Street Kitchen food truck

## About the Garden
Powderhorn Community Garden has served the neighborhood since 2003. We maintain 45 plots available to residents at no cost, with a focus on culturally relevant crops for our diverse community. We also donate produce to Briva Health food shelf and Midtown Global Market's community fridge.

**Register:** [eventbrite.com/powderhorn-spring-2026](https://eventbrite.com/powderhorn-spring-2026)

**Questions?** Contact Maria at garden@powderhornpark.org or 612-555-0147

Organized by Powderhorn Park Neighborhood Association in partnership with Minneapolis Park and Recreation Board.
